identity.Description: The identity of the cache, if configured.

systemData.Description: The system meta data relating to this resource.

principalId.Description: The principal id of the cache.

tenantId.Description: The tenant id associated with the cache.

type.Description: The type of identity used for the cache

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

cacheSizeGB.Description: The size of this Cache, in GB.

mountAddresses.Description: Array of IP addresses that can be used by clients mounting this Cache.

networkSettings.Description: Specifies network settings of the cache.

encryptionSettings.Description: Specifies encryption settings of the cache.

securitySettings.Description: Specifies security settings of the cache.

directoryServicesSettings.Description: Specifies Directory Services settings of the cache.

conditions.Description: Outstanding conditions that need to be investigated and resolved.

timestamp.Description: The time when the condition was raised.

currentFirmwareVersion.Description: Version string of the firmware currently installed on this Cache.

firmwareUpdateStatus.Description: True if there is a firmware update ready to install on this Cache. The firmware will automatically be installed after firmwareUpdateDeadline if not triggered earlier via the upgrade operation.

firmwareUpdateDeadline.Description: Time at which the pending firmware update will automatically be installed on the Cache.

lastFirmwareUpdate.Description: Time of the last successful firmware update.

pendingFirmwareVersion.Description: When firmwareUpdateAvailable is true, this field holds the version string for the update.

mtu.Description: The IPv4 maximum transmission unit configured for the subnet.

utilityAddresses.Description: Array of additional IP addresses used by this Cache.

dnsServers.Description: DNS servers for the cache to use.  It will be set from the network configuration if no value is provided.

ntpServer.Description: NTP server IP Address or FQDN for the cache to use. The default is time.windows.com.

keyEncryptionKey.Description: Specifies the location of the key encryption key in Key Vault.

keyUrl.Description: The URL referencing a key encryption key in Key Vault.

sourceVault.Description: Describes a resource Id to source Key Vault.

accessPolicies.Description: NFS access policies defined for this cache.

name.Description: Name identifying this policy. Access Policy names are not case sensitive.

accessRules.Description: The set of rules describing client accesses allowed under this policy.

scope.Description: Scope for this rule. The scope and filter determine which clients match the rule.

filter.Description: Filter applied to the scope for this rule. The filter's format depends on its scope. 'default' scope matches all clients and has no filter value. 'network' scope takes a filter in CIDR format (for example, 10.99.1.0/24). 'host' takes an IP address or fully qualified domain name as filter. If a client does not match any filter rule and there is no default rule, access is denied.

submountAccess.Description: For the default policy, allow access to subdirectories under the root export. If this is set to no, clients can only mount the path '/'. If set to yes, clients can mount a deeper path, like '/a/b'.

rootSquash.Description: Map root accesses to anonymousUID and anonymousGID.

anonymousUID.Description: UID value that replaces 0 when rootSquash is true. 65534 will be used if not provided.

anonymousGID.Description: GID value that replaces 0 when rootSquash is true. This will use the value of anonymousUID if not provided.

activeDirectory.Description: Specifies settings for joining the HPC Cache to an Active Directory domain.

usernameDownload.Description: Specifies settings for Extended Groups. Extended Groups allows users to be members of more than 16 groups.

primaryDnsIpAddress.Description: Primary DNS IP address used to resolve the Active Directory domain controller's fully qualified domain name.

secondaryDnsIpAddress.Description: Secondary DNS IP address used to resolve the Active Directory domain controller's fully qualified domain name.

domainName.Description: The fully qualified domain name of the Active Directory domain controller.

domainNetBiosName.Description: The Active Directory domain's NetBIOS name.

cacheNetBiosName.Description: The NetBIOS name to assign to the HPC Cache when it joins the Active Directory domain as a server. Length must 1-15 characters from the class [-0-9a-zA-Z].

domainJoined.Description: True if the HPC Cache is joined to the Active Directory domain.

credentials.Description: Active Directory admin credentials used to join the HPC Cache to a domain.

username.Description: Username of the Active Directory domain administrator. This value is stored encrypted and not returned on response.

password.Description: Plain text password of the Active Directory domain administrator. This value is stored encrypted and not returned on response.

extendedGroups.Description: Whether or not Extended Groups is enabled.

usernameSource.Description: This setting determines how the cache gets username and group names for clients.

groupFileURI.Description: The URI of the file containing group information (in /etc/group file format). This field must be populated when 'usernameSource' is set to 'File'.

userFileURI.Description: The URI of the file containing user information (in /etc/passwd file format). This field must be populated when 'usernameSource' is set to 'File'.

ldapServer.Description: The fully qualified domain name or IP address of the LDAP server to use.

ldapBaseDN.Description: The base distinguished name for the LDAP domain.

encryptLdapConnection.Description: Whether or not the LDAP connection should be encrypted.

requireValidCertificate.Description: Determines if the certificates must be validated by a certificate authority. When true, caCertificateURI must be provided.

autoDownloadCertificate.Description: Determines if the certificate should be automatically downloaded. This applies to 'caCertificateURI' only if 'requireValidCertificate' is true.

caCertificateURI.Description: The URI of the CA certificate to validate the LDAP secure connection. This field must be populated when 'requireValidCertificate' is set to true.

usernameDownloaded.Description: Indicates whether or not the HPC Cache has performed the username download successfully.

credentials.Description: When present, these are the credentials for the secure LDAP connection.

bindDn.Description: The Bind Distinguished Name identity to be used in the secure LDAP connection. This value is stored encrypted and not returned on response.

bindPassword.Description: The Bind password to be used in the secure LDAP connection. This value is stored encrypted and not returned on response.

systemData.Description: The system meta data relating to this resource.

junctions.Description: List of Cache namespace junctions to target for namespace associations.

namespacePath.Description: Namespace path on a Cache for a Storage Target.

targetPath.Description: Path in Storage Target to which namespacePath points.

nfsAccessPolicy.Description: Name of the access policy applied to this junction.

target.Description: IP address or host name of an NFSv3 host (e.g., 10.0.44.44).

usageModel.Description: Identifies the StorageCache usage model to be used for this storage target.

attributes.Description: Dictionary of string->string pairs containing information about the Storage Target.

target.Description: Resource ID of the storage container.

usageModel.Description: Identifies the StorageCache usage model to be used for this storage target.
